title: nAvirrakzhagu meyyE
sahitya:
nAvirkkazhagu meyyE nanmai keDuppadum poyyE


anupallavi

  AviyuLLOrkk-aNikalam nAvE pAvalar pOTrip-paNivadum nAvE


caraNam    paTTinam poriyAl paTri erivadu pArppAi duTTar tam nAvAl tImai varuvadu tIrppAi
naTTam viLaivikkum naman kaiyil sErkkum diTTamAi sollumE satya mArgam
